description:
Kouhei’s family, Hazuki, and Haiji seek mystical assistance at the Mido home in Kyoto. When Elfriede arranges a clandestine rendezvous with Kouhei, Hazuki steps in to set things straight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart Throbs in Kyoto with Big Brother
Onii-sama to Kyoto de... ufu! Wakuwaku!
おにいさまと京都で... うふ♡わくわく♡♡
